title: One Piece 579 'Landing! The Burning Island, Punk Hazard' Review

description: Episode review praising it as 'fast, fun, and exciting' and a 'terrific start to the new Punk Hazard arc' with grade B. Critiques include character design proportions and continuity about dragon encounters.
